sense.def: Pathological Condition Abbreviated Designation of lan xian feng yan 爛弦風眼 , festering [eyelid] rim with wind eye. Wei sheng yi jian fang 衛生易簡方 7: 用銅青、白堊粉、五倍子為末。熱湯泡，閉目熱洗，冷再熱洗 之，爛弦者最效 , “Prepare a powder from tong qing , bai e fen and wu pei zi and heat to boiling. Wash the closed eyes with the hot liquid. When [the liquid] is cold heat it again to wash the [eyes]. For festering [eyelid] rim this is most effective”.
